name: BluetoothRemoteGATTService.getIncludedService
description: The BluetoothGATTService.getIncludedService() method returns a Promise to an instance of BluetoothGATTService for a given universally unique identifier (UUID).
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothGATTService.getIncludedService() method returnsa Promise toan instance of BluetoothGATTService for a given universally unique identifier (UUID).
